鑿.definition: (bound form) chisel; to bore a hole; to chisel; to dig; (literary) certain; authentic; irrefutable; also pr. [zuo4]

鑿壁偷光.definition: lit. to pierce the wall to steal a light (idiom); fig. to study diligently in the face of hardship

鑿死卯子.definition: variant of 鑿死鉚子|凿死铆子[zao2 si3mao3zi5]

鑿空.definition: to open an aperture; (extended meaning) to cut a way through; to open up a road
